title: Video Understanding: Beyond Single Frames
description: Learn Video Understanding: Beyond Single Frames in one minute.

hook.text: A photo of a hand near a ball tells you nothing. A video shows the throw, catch, or drop.

buildup.text: Video understanding analyzes temporal sequences: actions, events, and scene transitions.

discovery.text: Architectures: 3D CNNs, video transformers, and two-stream networks (spatial + temporal).

climax.text: Applications: surveillance, sports analysis, autonomous driving, and content moderation.

quiz.question: Why are video models more expensive than image models?
options: The extra temporal dimension multiplies computation
